compliment.1: What's a model like you doing with me?
compliment.2: I am so honoured to be in your presence

insult.0: Do they just serve anyone here now?
insult.1: Get a better outfit and you'd be kinda cute
insult.2: Your very existence makes my eyes sore

joke.0: Can you pay? I ran out of cache
joke.1: What's a bot's favourite music? Heavy metal
joke.2: Boy, you turn my floppy disk into a hard drive
